Title: Over 79.9 crore Ayushman Bharat Health Accounts created
Description: ABDM achieves milestone of over 79.91 crore ABHA registrations nationwide.

Title: Ayushman Bharat becomes world's largest public health network
Description: Expansion of primary healthcare through Ayushman Bharat and ABDM integration.

Title: National Health Authority Hosts 2-Day PM-JAY & ABDM Review
Description: Strategic review and progress evaluation of PM-JAY and ABDM missions.

Title: Ayushman Bharat benefits over 45 crore citizens
Description: More than 45 crore citizens covered under Ayushman Bharat Yojana.

Title: Over 86 lakh Ayushman Vay Vandana cards created
Description: Ayushman Vay Vandana cards issued to 86.51 lakh senior citizens.

Title: Ayushman Bharat Transforms India's Healthcare
Description: Expansion of primary healthcare infrastructure and digital health services.
